title: Armen Akopyan
text:
Armen Akopyan (, born 15 January 1980 in <a href="Zaporizhzhia">Zaporizhzhia</a>, <a href="Ukrainian%20SSR">Ukrainian SSR</a>) is a <a href="Ukrainian%20people">Ukrainian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> of <a href="Armenian%20people">Armenian</a> descent. He last played for <a href="FC%20Poltava">FC Poltava</a>.
Akopyan spent most of his career playing for <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> team <a href="FC%20Metalurh%20Zaporizhya">FC Metalurh Zaporizhya</a>.
